text: Egha Jehu nguibar ekiamɨn tiar akar ekiamɨn aven zuir dughiamɨn, Jesebel kamaghɨn an dɨa ghaze, “O Simri,9:31 Jesebel ziar kam Jehu gatɨ, Simri. A fo, Simri fomɨra atrivimɨn ingangarir gumazir mam, a uan atrivim mɨsoghezɨ, an areme. Ezɨ Jehu datɨrɨghɨn uaghan arazir kamram ami. Nɨ 1 Eghaghaniba 16:8-20ɨn gan. nɨ uan gumazir ekiam mɨsoghezɨ an aremezir gumazim, nɨ ti deragha iti?”
